about_the_game:
❖SYNOPIS

A wicked girl-adventure RPG, with the elements of exploration, 2D action combat, and puzzles, developed in RPG Maker.

In this game, you play as a tomboy maid, runaway from her captor and master, who dreams of exploring the world, becoming a famous warrior princess and finding many riches - but the evil nature that runs in your devilry blood, the razor-sharp teeth and striking white hair, make you an enemy of many and a friend to few.

❖FEATURES

  • Maid gameplay.
  • Simple and approachable but fun combat system, with slower paced puzzles.
  • Tools - items hidden throughout the game's immersive maps, essential for solving puzzles and aiding you in battles. These range from potions to bombs, and function similarly to item systems found in 2D Zelda games, allowing you to equip one tool at a time, or are reminiscent of the effects in Yume Nikki.
  • Twisted, rotten narrative.
  • Whimsical and treacherous world inspired by Slavic folklore and Alice in Wonderland.
  • Highly stylized, charming and grimy visuals.
  • A revenge that can only be fulfilled by your fate, your duty and your -------... Or maybe your ----?

name: Maid In Wonderland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
